title: Enhancing App Development Practical Competencies: Reflective Professional Mathematics Learning Design through Digital Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world mathematical problems in actual occupational settings with 80% accuracy in a VR-based simulation environment.
Learners can analyze digital tool utilization cases through reflective journaling and document learning effectiveness using a three-stage evaluation framework (before-change-growth).

Learners can evaluate the suitability of selected digital technologies (simplicity/accessibility) in the learning design process against five criteria (efficiency, applicability, etc.) relative to professional learning objectives.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
